channel.title: Request: Up-to date list of Tor-friendly VPN services
channel.description: Is there such a thing? Goal is to run VPN from Whonix workstation or Windows/other Linux guest routed through Whonix gateway. This is for dealing with sites poisoned with Tor-unfriendly Google captchas and with CloudFlare. VPN has to be Tor friendly: allow signups over Tor, if it requires signing up, and support TCP of course.

item.title: Request: Up-to date list of Tor-friendly VPN services
item.dc:creator: onion_knight
item.description:
I know AirVPN and NordVPN used to allow signing up over Tor. This doesn’t mean they’re won’t be some catchas to solve… They also used to accept paying in BTC and maybe other cryptocurrencies.

Read full topic
item.source: Request: Up-to date list of Tor-friendly VPN services
